TopicTitle: REQUEST: Fixed rate for hiring Kerbals

Articles.Content: Kerbals are expensive, especially late in a career mode game. In fact, it can get to the point where a Kerbal costs more than a Jool fleet. For no apparent reason, the cost of Kerbals increases if you have more. This makes it tough to staff bases and stations. I was wondering if someone could make a quick little mod that changes the hiring cost of Kerbals to 50,000 funds, and that will never go up. Thanks in advance!

Sarbian's Custom Barn Kit allows you to set a flat rate or change the constants for the formula.  I wouldn't mind seeing a mod that allows for a different formula.  I think something that approaches a constant asymptote would work better.
@TheReadPanda also has a really nice mod that deals with this

My mod is on hold to work on until 1.1 comes out of pre-release and even then it will take some work to get it done but it /will/ be updated for 1.1. Just have to be patient I'm sorry to say! But thanks for the promo there @RoverDude
